title: Download Chrome - Google Chrome Help
text: Check system requirements to use Chrome You can use Chrome with: - iOS 17 and up - All languages supported by the App Store - On your iPhone or iPad, open App Store. - In the search bar, enter Chrome . - Tap Get. - To install, follow the on-screen instructions. - If prompted, enter your Apple ID password. - To start browsing, tap Open. - To open Chrome from your Home screen, tap Chrome .
